---
title: "Postgres Benchmark"
output: pdf_document
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r, echo=FALSE}
# import data
library(readr)
dd <- read_delim("postgres_gluster_vs_local.txt", ";", col_types = cols(device=col_character(), progress_seconds = col_double(), transactions_per_second = col_double(), latency_ms = col_double()), escape_double = FALSE, trim_ws = TRUE)
library(data.table)
dd <- as.data.table(dd)

library(ggplot2)
library(scales)

# plot 1
ggplot(dd[device=="gluster" | device=="local"], aes(x=device, y=transactions_per_second, group=device)) + geom_boxplot() + xlab("Postgres Read-Write Benchmark") + ylab("Transactions Per Second")
# plot 2
ggplot(dd[device=="gluster_read_only" | device=="local_read_only"], aes(x=device, y=transactions_per_second, group=device)) + geom_boxplot() + xlab("Postgres Read-Only Benchmark") + ylab("Transactions Per Second")
```
